Halstead Square is a vibrant, pedestrian-friendly neighborhood complete with shops, restaurants, and four distinct, luxury apartment buildings. Ample amenities and apartment homes with uniquely crafted finishes are the perfect place to call home. It?s all that, and then some. Stylish, high-end spaces. Features and amenities that are notches above the rest. Discover The Lofts. It?s apartment living on a whole other level.

Description: Arrowood Parc features modern apartment homes with various floor plans to choose from, plus we are set apart from the rest in features and amenities in many ways! Conveniently located in Historic Vienna off of Chain Bridge Road and just minutes from the Vienna Metro Station, Route 50, I-66 and the Capital Beltway. Close to unlimited options for dining, entertainment and shopping in Tysons Corner, Fairfax Corner, Fair Oaks, downtown Fairfax and the surrounding Washington, D.C. area. Nearby are George Mason University and the Oak Marr Recreational Center and Golf Course. We have some of the largest eat-in kitchens in the area and we include gas utilities for cooking and heat in the rent! Walk to nearby shopping centers with Whole Foods and Giant or bike the W&OD Trail. Not only do we allow pets, but our pet fees are among the lowest around. Love to live, love Arrowood Parc!

Description: Merrifield at Dunn Loring Station offers ideal town and country living. It is one of the Washington area's most comfortable and "most liveable" communities. Transportation is quick and easy via the beltway or, just a block away, is the Dunn Loring Metro Station with easy access to Washington, D.C. and surrounding cities, schools, places of worship, movies and entertainment and shopping centers. At Merrifield at Dunn Loring Station, we provide a clubhouse with a complete kitchen for resident activities, and private parties. We boast an exercise center, nine children's playparks,two outdoor swimming pools and a wading pool, tennis, basketball, and volleyball courts, and an inviting barbecue area, as well. All this, located in an expanse of beautifully landscaped, lush and greenery and trees. If you want a true sense of community-not just a complex-and a welcoming home-not just another apartment-then Merrifield at Dunn Loring Station is for you.

Description:
ACROSS FROM VIENNA METRO STATION. WALK TO METRO. MOVE IN READY AVAILABLE ASAP. LIGHT FILLED TOP FLOOR CONDO WITH VAULTED CEILING.HARDWOOD FLOOR THROUGH OUT. GAS FIREPLACE. EXERCISE ROOM, CLUB ROOM & SWIMMING POOL AT COMMUNITY CENTER. 
The condo is super convenient to the Metro: just cross the crosswalk and you are at the North side of the Vienna Metro.
Fabulous 1 bed/1 bath condo with Hardwood Floors, Granite Counters, built in desk/work space, and Gas Fireplace. Balcony overlooking trees and common area. Home comes with one garage parking spot.
Community amenities: The Marquis at Vienna Station condominium has an outdoor pool open from Memorial Day to Labor Day with lifeguards. The gym in the clubhouse is open 24 hours. The clubhouse also has the business center, community room, and more. The private courtyards have grills that are available for use. There is a shortcut to Nottoway Park through the townhouses neighboring the building.

Description:
A beautiful unfurnished townhome with 3 or 4 bedrooms, 3 ½ baths, living room, dining room, kitchen, recreation room (or office or fourth bedroom) with built-in shelving and cabinets, fenced rear yard with patio, two reserved parking spaces, located within 5 minute walk of the Vienna Metro Station (Orange Line) and a 6 miles to Tyson's Corner. Always get a seat on the Metro train at the Vienna Metro Station, the first terminal on the in-bound line. The Pentagon is 28 minutes from the Vienna station and the HQMC and the Navy Yard is 58 minutes. A commuter's delight.
The front door entry at the ground level has a foyer with a coat closet and a half bath, with the hallway leading to the open, two tiered living room and dining room. The foyer, hallway, dining room, living room, and stairways all have hardwood floors. The kitchen has two doorways, one connects to the foyer and the other to the dining room directly. The upgraded kitchen has new quartz counter tops, a large eat-in kitchen table space in front of a double window. Appliances include dishwasher, disposal, new oven and range, range hood, and a refrigerator with a bottom freezer.
The upper floor has 3 bedrooms including a 12' x 17' master bedroom with a ceiling fan, walk in clothes closet, a separate linen closet and a full bathroom with the sink and shower separated from an enclosed toilet; a 10' x 10' bedroom with closet and ceiling fan and an 8' x 11' bedroom with closet and ceiling fan; and another full bathroom in the center hallway.
The fully finished lower level has a full bathroom convenient to the recreation room / office / fourth bedroom which has hardwood floors, built in bookcases and cabinets. The large lower level room has previously been used as a recreation room, an in-home office, an exercise room, and a fourth bedroom. A washing machine and dryer are located in a separate utility room with the heating and air conditioning system and there is an additional enclosed storage closet. 
Two numbered, reserved parking spaces are in front of the townhome. The back yard is enclosed with a wood privacy fence and has a masonry patio bordered with landscaping inside the fence. 
Heat is electric forced hot air and cooling is central air conditioning. A new HVAC system was installed in 2013.
The townhome is in the Mosby Woods Elementary School, Jackson Middle School and Oakton High School areas. Oakton High School is also a short 5 minute walk through the subdivision on paved sidewalks.
Rent is $2,700 monthly plus utilities. Electric (Dominion Power) and water (Fairfax Municipal) are direct from the utility. Refuse and recycling pick up and snow plowing is $25. The landlord pays the Homeowners Association dues.
Available immediately for lease. A security deposit is required of one month rent. Shown by appointment. Photos are online at Craigslist Military by Owner and Zillow. Please e-mail the owner, John Rohrback at RivieraLeasing@aol.com or telephone 703-915-6292. No texts. I will be happy answer any questions and to show the townhome located on Village Spring Lane; Vienna, VA 22181.

Description:
2755 Manhattan Place, Vienna VA
Available December 1, 2017 is this amazing grand 4BR 3.5BA Garaged Townhome across street from Dunn Loring Metro, and less than a mile to I-495 Beltway. 
This home has large rooms, lots of light, and is ready to be called home.
It features granite counters in large eat-in kitchen, which sits just off a large family room. Perfect for "Hang around the kitchen" gatherings!! Large oversized energy efficient windows allow plenty of light. There is a half bath on the main level.
Upstairs, you will find 3 large bedrooms and two full baths. The Main BR has a large bathroom suite with large soaking tub, separate shower, and water closet with toilet.
Downstairs is a full finished walk out basement suite with bedroom, and full bath.
The home also features a two car garage!
within walking distance is the new Mosaic Center of Merrifield offering great new shopping experiences, and many new restaurants and pubs to try. It is becoming the new "Town Center" to visit. 
Being so close to Dunn Loring metro, and with easy access to 495, makes this a great location to be in! From the metro, you can go anywhere, including any of the large area malls, airport, or easily in to Washington DC.
Don't miss this one, this will go fast. 
Pets considered on case by case basis.
Easy secure online application at TMKenny Property Services

Quiet location on cul-de-sac Hardwood floors on two main levels granite counters stainless appliances double vanity in master bath glass doors to large deck off family room.
